department.ch: 永續綠能科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master Programs, Sustainability in Green Energy

remark.ch: 授課老師：洪文玲、王仲宇、吳祚任、黃志誠、江康鈺、張榮森、盧乙嘉、廖益弘、陳正一、許樹坤、曾重仁、陳立業、駱安亞、胡誌麟、李錫堤

goal.ch: 「綠能總論」課程邀請了15位在各專業領域擁有豐富經驗的專家學者，以專題方式講授能源發展的最新趨勢，課程從多角度切入綠能議題，為學生提供全面的綠能知識視野。
goal.en: The course “General introduction to green energy“ invites 15 distinguished experts and scholars from various specialized fields to deliver lectures on the latest trends in energy development. These topics approach green energy from diverse perspectives, providing a comprehensive understanding of this critical area.

outline.ch: 課程內容涵蓋生質能、發電、離岸風電設置與波浪能、離岸風電與海事工程、離岸風機檢測與管理、海洋能、太陽能、地熱能、智慧電網、電能轉換、智慧電網與輸配發電、地質氫、天然氣水合物、氫氣生產、氫氣儲存、氫能應用、能源管理及水力發電等主題。
outline.en: Through thematic discussions, the course covers a wide range of topics, including biomass energy, power generation, offshore wind power installation and wave energy, offshore wind power and marine engineering, offshore wind turbine inspection and management, ocean energy, solar energy, geothermal energy, smart grids, energy conversion, smart grids and power distribution, geological hydrogen, natural gas hydrates, hydrogen production, hydrogen storage, hydrogen applications, energy management, and hydropower.

textbook.en: Recommended individually by the course instructors.
